translations.translation: and they will be beaten with cudgels made of iron.
There are iron maces for them.
There shall be maces of iron to lash them.
They will be subdued by iron rods.
And for them are rods of iron.
And for them are hooked rods of iron.
And for them are whips of iron.
for them await hooked iron rods;
And for them are hooked rods of iron.
There will be maces of iron for them;
And for them shall be maces of iron.
and there will be clubs of iron for them.
In addition there will be maces of iron (to punish) them.
And for them are hooked rods of iron (to punish them).
for them are hooked rods of iron.
And they will have maces of iron.
And for [striking] them are maces of iron.
[22:21] And there will be hooked rods of iron for them, for their heads to be beaten with.
And for them are hooked rods of iron) of hot rods of iron with which they will be hit on their heads. 365

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَلَهُمْ مَّقَامِعُ مِنْ حَدِيدٍ } معناه مَطارقُ

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { ولهم مقامعُ من حديدٍ } أي: ولتعذيب الكفرة، أو لأجلهم، مقامع: جمع مقمعة، وهي آلة القمع، أي: سيَاط من حديد، يُضربون بها
